name: Site Establishment (Start-up)
Contract with Client signed?
Subcontractor Agreements signed and on the PCF?
Council Informed of activity?
TMPs approved?
Quality Plan completed?
Inspection and Test Plan completed?
Safety Plan completed?
Hazard Register completed?
WorkSafe notified of Hazardous Work?
Information Sign up?
Dump Site located and agreement with owner signed?
Construction Drawings on Site?
Public Notifications done?
Site Folder established and on Site?
Health and Safety Implementation
Is the Site Specific Safety Plan available and on site?
Is the hazard register on site?
Are Daily Safety Plan forms available?
Are there emergency procedures in place?
Is there a hazard register board displayed?
Is it up to date and reviewed?
Is there a qualified first aider available?
Has a drill been carried out?
Are there toilet facilities available?
Is there means to clean hands and dirt from body?
Is there a smoko room or similar area?
For those working with sewer works have they been immunised?
SDS file in place matching substances on site?
PPE
Are all staff wearing correct PPE?
Is it tidy and in good repair?
Are staff wearing seatbelts on trucks, rollers and loaders?
Are staff wearing hardhats where there are overhead hazards?
Staff Involvement in Safety
Are there completed daily safety plans present?
Are there completed plans for the last few working days? Pick 3
Is there a record of staff induction?  Pick 3 staff – are they inducted?
Have they signed the Daily Safety Plan for the day?
Covid 19
Is there a site sign in register?
Do staff have contact diaries?
Staff observing distance rules? Incl site and transport
Staff working in assigned bubbles?
Site and facilities being cleaned?
Equipment
Are chains tagged and in test?
Is electrical equipment tagged and in test?
Is there a first aid kit on site and is it complete?
Is there a fire extinguisher on site and is it charged and in test date?
Are diesel containers tagged?
Mobile Equipment
Are maintenance books present on applicable equipment?
Are maintenance sheets up to date?
Are defects being reported?
Calibration
Is critical measuring equipment calibrated?
Is it named with United Civil Id?
Is there a calibration tag and is it in date?
Is it on the Vault?
Subcontractors
Are high risk subcontractors (QHS or E) on the Approved Suppliers List?
Are they wearing correct PPE?
Are subcontractor employees inducted?
Purchasing
Do Purchase orders specify specifically what is being ordered?
Is the purchase amount within the DOA policy?
Is person signing PO authorised?
Training
Are staff licenced for the machinery they are operating?
Do staff have competency records for the equipment they are using?
Training plan developed, including orientation plan for new team members?
Have all required training requirements been met by the project team, i.e., Health, Safety & Environment, etc.?
Excavations
Are excavations 1.5m deep or greater battered, benched or shielded?
Is approved Code of Practice in place for excavation & trenches?
Are excavations protected for after hours?
Heights and Overhead
Are edges protected?
If working with 4m of power line proximity permits in place?
Vehicles
Are vehicles being driven on the road licensed?
Do they have WOF/COF if applicable?
Housekeeping – vehicles tidy?
Do the Utes/lights truck have diesel spill emergency response card?
Do the Utes/light trucks have a complete first aid kit?
Fences
Are fences compliant?
Are they in good repair?
Are they stable and safe?
Would they prevent entry by a child?
Confined Space
Are forms available for CSE?
Are there trained CSE people on site?
Are the forms filled out correctly?
Environmental
Is the Environmental Management Plan on site?
Erosion and Sediment Control Plan in place?
Are applicable Resources Consents present?
Are consents complete with applicable drawings?
Are environmental issue addressed in the Daily Safety Plan?
Is a Spill Kit available and complete?
Has monitoring been or planned to be carried out for the day?
Is there someone who is TP90/GD05 trained on site?
(Erosion & sediment control - ARC)
Compliant controls in place?
Quality
Is the Contract Quality Plan on site?
Are relevant Inspection sheets available as required by the ITP?
Have the relevant inspection sheets been completed to applicable stage in the contract?
Are Hold Points being signed off by the Engineer?
Are the correct status drawings on site?
Are Daily Work Reports being carried out?
Is there an As Built file present that is up to date?
Project Central File (PCF)
Are documents uniquely identified and version controlled
Are documents being stored only on backed-up network drives?
Is the electronic PCF the main file?
Are all project specific email files stored on Union Square?
Are both physical and electronic document files archived?
Changes to the Contract
Are variations documented and is there as file?
Has the CQP been duly updated to reflect any contract modification(s)?
Concerns, Corrective and Preventive Action
Is there a concerns register be operated?
Is there a corrective action file and is being?
Do Corrective Actions identify a root cause?
Are Corrective Actions verified to ensure they are effective?
Is Customer Feedback being recorded?
Traffic
Is the Traffic Management Plan on site?
Is the STMS on Site or back up STMS/TC?
Condition of signs OK?
Set out to plan or modified correctly?
Has the set up been monitored as per COPTTM requirements?
Recommendations/Observations/NCRs
Recommendations as per comments
Observations as per comments

Are maintenance sheets up to date?
Are defects being reported?
Calibration
Is critical measuring equipment calibrated?
Is it named with United Civil Id?
Is there a calibration tag and is it in date?
Is it on the Certification and Calibration Plant Register?
Subcontractors
Are high risk subcontractors (QHS or E) on the Approved Suppliers List in PIM?
Have they provided the required Site documentation i.e. JSA, Task Analysis, etc?
Are they wearing correct PPE?
Are subcontractor employees inducted?
Are their records for subcontractor VOC on site
Responsibilities are defined & coordinated via contractual agreements/overlapping duties form
Purchasing
Do Purchase orders specify specifically what is being ordered?
Is the purchase amount within the DOA policy?
Is person signing PO authorised?
Training
Are staff licenced for the machinery they are operating?
Do staff have competency records for the equipment they are using?
Training plan developed, including orientation plan for new team members?
Have all required training requirements been met by the project team, i.e., Health, Safety & Environment, etc.?
Excavations
Are excavations 1.5m deep or greater battered, benched or shielded?
Permit to Dig in place for all excavations?
Are excavations protected for after hours?
Heights and Overhead
Are edges protected?
If working with 4m of power line proximity permits in place?
Vehicles
Are vehicles being driven on the road licensed?
Do they have WOF/COF if applicable?
Housekeeping are vehicles tidy?
Do the Utes/lights truck have diesel spill emergency response card?
Do the Utes/light trucks have a complete first aid kit?
TSL Tickets on Site and used as required?
Fences
Are fences compliant?
Are they in good repair?
Are they stable and safe?
Would they prevent entry by a child?
Confined Space
Are forms available for CSE?
Are there trained CSE people on site?
Are the forms filled out correctly?
Environmental
Erosion and Sediment Control Plan in place?
Are applicable Resources Consents present?
Are consents complete with applicable drawings?
Are environmental issue addressed in the Daily Safety Plan?
Is a Spill Kit available and complete?
Has monitoring been or planned to be carried out for the day?
Compliant controls in place?
Quality
Are relevant Inspection sheets available as required by the ITP?
Have the relevant inspection sheets been completed to applicable stage in the contract?
Are Hold Points being signed off by the Engineer?
Are the correct status drawings on site?
Are Daily Work Reports being carried out?
Is there an As Built file present that is up to date?
Traffic
Is the Traffic Management Plan on site?
Is the STMS on Site or back up STMS/TC?
Condition of signs OK?
Set out to plan or modified correctly?
Has the set up been monitored as per COPTTM requirements?
Operations
Are storage areas, safe, accessible and don’t interfere with designated areas (people & plant)
Manual handling risk has been identified, assessed and managed using an established risk assessment tool
Dust suppression techniques are effective at reducing dust generation to a minimum?
Working hour restrictions are in place and being adhered to in residential areas?
Flora and fauna controls are effective and followed
Cultural & Heritage controls are effective and followed
Waste Management controls are effective and followed
